plays.text: Goal scored by Jeff Daniels assisted by Aaron Ward and Sandis Ozolinsh
Penalty to Marek Malik 2 minutes for Tripping Rem Murray

Penalty to Sami Kapanen 2 minutes for High Sticking Janne Niinimaa
Penalty to Aaron Ward 2 minutes for Holding Todd Marchant
Penalty to Scott Ferguson 2 minutes for Interference Josef Vasicek
Penalty to Ethan Moreau 2 minutes for Hooking Ron Francis
Penalty to Ron Francis 2 minutes for Diving(opposing player not identified)
